attributes.action: Help Women and Girls in Afghanistan
attributes.additional_details: People are truly at risk from the Taliban and it’s so important to help before it’s too late to do anything. Everybody should be able to have an education and a space to live which is safe and equal.
attributes.background: It is so important that the government puts in the most effort possible to get out the most vulnerable people from Afghanistan. This could be done by offering refuge or education or any other solution but it is crucial that we act before it is too late.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We understand that you are concerned about the safety of people in Afghanistan, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Help the people of Afghanistan: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594723

Increase the number of Afghan refugees the UK will welcome: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595479

The UK to lead the effort to resettle Afghans fleeing the Taliban: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595023
